item.title: Matrices Multiplication
item.description: Solve the Matrix Equation Given two matrices \( A \) and \( B \): \[ A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{bmatrix}, \quad B = \begin{bmatrix} 5 & 6 \\ 7 & 8 \end{bmatrix} \] Find the product \( A \times B \).

item.title: Matrix Multiplication Question
item.description: Practice matrix multiplication with this CBSE Class 12 Mathematics question. Learn how to multiply 2x2 matrices step-by-step.

item.title: trigonometric functions
item.description: Solve the Matrix Equation Given two matrices \( A \) and \( B \): \[ A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{bmatrix}, \quad B = \begin{bmatrix} 5 & 6 \\ 7 & 8 \end{bmatrix} \] Find the product \( A \times B \).
